CustomField.description: If the case is open today minus the Deposit Date. If the case is closed, case close date minus the Deposit Date. Formula excludes weekends
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate),
(today() - (Deposit_Date__c) - 2*(floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(((Deposit_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate) - (Deposit_Date__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Case_Lookup__r.ClosedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(((Deposit_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Days Since Deposit
